briefTitle: Enhancing Hair Density With Platelet Rich Fibrin Matrix (PRFM)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* age 18- 75 years old
* frontal and/or crown alopecia

Exclusion Criteria:

* bleeding disorder

outcomeMeasures.title: Hair Density Change After Three Treatments
outcomeMeasures.description: Hair density index at calibrated distance from glabella in a 2 cm x 2 cm midline square at 6 month follow up visit as a percentage of initial (pre-treatment) hair density index, measured using a proprietary hair densitometer.
